fields.name: CAUSE_OF_DEATH

enum: (P00-P96) Certain conditions originating in the perinatal period
(Q00-Q99) Congenital malformations, deformations and chromosomal abnormalities
(D50-D89) Diseases of the blood and blood-forming organs, disorders involving the immune mechanism
(H00-H93) Diseases of the eye, ear and adnexa
(M00-M99) Diseases of the musculoskeletal system and connective tissue
(L00-L99) Diseases of the skin and subcutaneous tissue
(Z00-Z99) Factors influencing health status and contract with health services
(S00-T98) Injuries, poisoning and consequences of external causes
(R00-R99) Symptoms, signs and abnormal clinical and laboratory findings, not elsewhere classified

fields.title: Cause of death (as per ICD-10 codes)

title: Number of deaths by cause of death per 100,000 population
